## Config.ResourceTypeFactory class

A factory that creates a [ResourceType](./ts-res.resourcetypes.resourcetype.md) from a [resource type configuration](./ts-res.resourcetypes.config.iresourcetypeconfig.md) by chaining a supplied factory with a [built-in factory](./ts-res.config.builtinresourcetypefactory.md) that handles built-in resource types.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ResourceTypeFactory extends ChainedConfigInitFactory<ResourceTypes.Config.IResourceTypeConfig, ResourceType> 
```
**Extends:** [ChainedConfigInitFactory](./ts-res.config.chainedconfiginitfactory.md)<!-- -->&lt;ResourceTypes.Config.IResourceTypeConfig, [ResourceType](./ts-res.resourcetype.md)<!-- -->&gt;
